===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# [[again]]; [[once more]]
#* {{zh-x|又 下雨 了！|It's raining '''again'''!}}
#* {{zh-x|想 了 又 想|to think and think; to deeply think about}}
# [[also]]; [[in addition]]
#* {{zh-x|神 就 造 出 大 魚 和 水 中 所 滋生 各樣 有 生命 的 動物，各 從 其 類。又 造 出 各樣 飛鳥，各 從 其 類。神 看 著[着]{zhuó} 是 好{hǎo} 的。|And God created great whales, and every living creature that moveth, which the waters brought forth abundantly, after their kind, and every winged fowl after his kind: and God saw that it was good.|ref=[http://wordproject.org/multi/bi_en_cn_py.htm Genesis 1:21]}}
# [[and]]; [[too]]
# ({{lang|zh|又……又……}}) [[both]] ... [[and]] ...
#* {{zh-x|我 又 餓 又 渴。|I am hungry and thirsty.}}
